caption:
Table 1. Comparison of the network using plain concatenation 
block or WR reconstruction block, including PSNR and SSIM for 
scale 2×, 4× and 8× SR on Set5 and Set14. Red indicates the 
best results.

Table 2. Quantitative evaluation of state-of-the-art SR approaches, including PSNR and SSIM for scale 2×, 4× and 8×. Red indicates the 
best and blue indicates the second best results.
